      • readInstances

        public Iterable<ISubgraphInstance> readInstances(ISubgraph subgraph,
                                        long startTime,
                                        long endTime,
                                        PropertySet vertexProperties,
                                        PropertySet edgeProperties)
                                          throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ISliceManager
        Returns an iterable that will load instances that fit the query on demand. The given timespan is evaluated with respect to the start time of each instance.
        Specified by:
        readInstances in interface ISliceManager
        Parameters:
        subgraph - the subgraph to retrieve instances for
        startTime - the earliest time to retrieve instances for
        endTime - the latest time to retrieve instances for
        vertexProperties - the properties to retrieve for vertices
        edgeProperties - the properties to retrieve for edges
        Returns:
        An iterable which will return instances matching the query, loaded on demand
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeTemplate

        public int writeTemplate(IPartition partition)
                  throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ISliceManager
        Writes the template data of the given partition, no instance information is written. The partition id must match any previous id, and any previous information will be overwritten.
        Specified by:
        writeTemplate in interface ISliceManager
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition to write
        Returns:
        the number of bytes written
        Throws:
        IOException
